reviews.review_msg: Shes nice and passionate on the topic but disorganized, many slides/readings not uploaded, a couple of classes were cancelled, and brief and unclear descriptions for assignments, which were graded quite tough. The lectures were short and didnt learn much from them

Dont take this class if shes the prof, her teaching is super disorganized so even if the content is interesting youre getting nothing from it. Her assignments are very vague and the expectations are super high so dont expect to get a good mark if you dont do way more than expected. This class was probably way better with the original prof.

Short and easy assignments, easy readings. She was accommodating with COVID stuff. The problem was Meloras disorganization, especially with lecture scheduling. We had a 2 hour lecture window which was not used most of the time. Once in a while she would tell us she was doing a live lecture, with no notice (told us 1hr before).
I highly recommend avoiding her. her classes are unclear, the material is basically just pro-marxism, it's tiresome, she denies reality, really avoid if you can.

Uses a harsh grading scheme that puts 80-84% as a B+. Lectures were not as informative as they should be, many of us agreed that she talks about irrelevant things way too much. Nice person, but doesn't prepare before class, which reflects her teaching attitude. Disorganized and can't convey important ideas clearly.

Melora didn't give a ton of feedback for assignments, and definitely struggled with the transition to online learning due to COVID. Despite that, she was a great prof, gave very interesting assignments and readings, and was patient and very receptive to feedback.

Highly disorganized. She doesn't prep things before class so we always get into lots of technical problems during lecture and waste a lot of time. Lectures are super vague and you can get a better understanding of the material by just doing the readings and the discussion questions yourself. FYI, she's the most disorg prof I've had in my 4 years.

Although seemingly well meaning, she is extremely disorganized and not a competent professor. Her lectures are all over the place with students left scratching their heads after class. I will never take her class again. I highly recommend avoiding her as a prof.
Very good professor. I really enjoyed class with her throughout my semester. Good prof for easy scoring
Unclear grading criteria. No response or significantly-delayed response to emails.
